name: The Arkham Historical Circle
public_facade: A small, informal group of Miskatonic professors and local history enthusiasts.
true_purpose: To study and document the 'hidden history' of Arkham and its surrounding areas, focusing on events and families that are omitted from official records.
leader: Professor Wallace Dyer is the unofficial head, though he is very cautious about their inquiries.
headquarters: They meet monthly in a private study room at the Miskatonic Library.
rumors: They are particularly interested in the witch trials of the 17th century and the strange disappearances of the 19th century. Some say they are looking for something they call the 'Arkham witch-cult'.
